name: weakvaluemap
description: A map where the values are stored using weak references

scripts.deepinstall: if [ -n "$gitroot" ]; then FORCE_INSTALL_LIBS=1 $gitroot/src/bs/linklibs.sh; else FORCE_INSTALL_LIBS=1 ../../bs/linklibs.sh; fi
